segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that plate, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring from the faucet, overflowing the sink in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge, soaking the cabinet doors and forming a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in that water, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, there are stacks of clean dishes waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, a boy is climbing on a wobbly stool to reach the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, grabbing treats like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, reaching up with her hand open, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, hoping the woman doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR
